text: @AOC I am sure that Creature 45 and Stephen Miller will be delighted that the populations size of People of Color is decreasing. The COVID-19 pandemic might just what Creature 45 envisions in his beloved slogan, “MAGA.” Yes, White Supremacy must remain the unwritten law of the land.
